plugins.name: Figma to PostGrid
plugins.description:
Figma to PostGrid


The Figma to PostGrid Plugin is built for designers and developers, letting you easily export your Figma designs into ready-to-use PostGrid templates. This means you can leverage the power of Figma's design tools to create stunning and personalized direct mail pieces, all without leaving Figma.


What can you do with the Plugin?


  1. Works great with how you already design: No need to make major shifts within your systems, tools and tech stacks, the plugin works seamlessly with your existing design workflow!
  2. One-click export: Export your beautiful designs directly into PostGrid with just a few clicks.
  3. Make it yours: Use merge variables to add personalized information to each piece of mail, making it unique.
  4. Ditch the PDFs: Forget about static PDFs and create mailers that are more engaging and interactive.


How to get started


  1. Open the plugin in your Figma workspace.
  2. Sign in using your PostGrid account credentials or add the test/live API key.
  3. Click on "Create Template" to add the supported template and create the collateral from scratch.
  4. Click on "Export Template" once you are ready with the collateral design.


Access the detailed guide to help you get started.


Reach out to support@postgrid.com if you have any questions or issues.
plugins.tagline: Effortlessly convert Figma designs into dynamic PostGrid direct mail templates.

plugins.name: BuilderFlash
plugins.description:
Builder Flash is a powerful tool designed to streamline your Figma workflow. With this plugin, you can effortlessly transform JSON data into fully realized layouts in Figma. Whether you're designing a website header, app interface, or any other visual element, this plugin simplifies the process.


Example JSON Data:


https://raw.githubusercontent.com/moluskorp/Flowflash/main/json.txt


Just copy and paste in the TextInput


How It Works:

  1. Upload JSON: Simply provide your JSON data, like the example above.
  2. Generate Layout: The plugin will parse the JSON and generate a Figma layout based on the structure and properties defined in your JSON.
  3. Customize: Once the layout is generated, you can easily customize it further to suit your design needs.

Features:

  • Supports a variety of design elements, including frames, rectangles, text, and more.
  • Maintains accuracy and fidelity when translating JSON data to Figma components.
  • Saves you time and effort by automating the layout creation process.
  • Intuitive and user-friendly interface for a seamless experience.

Enhance your design workflow and save valuable time with the JSON to Figma Layout Generator. Say goodbye to manual design work and hello to efficiency!

Try it out with the provided JSON example for testing purposes.

Note: The JSON example provided here is for demonstration purposes only. Replace it with your actual JSON data to generate your desired layout.
plugins.tagline: Generates canvas through JSON

plugins.name: NoMoreWrite-我不想再手写填充文本了！
plugins.description:
NoMoreWrite

一款帮助设计师快速填充文本的 Figma 插件。

功能特性

支持多行业数据生成

常用信息（姓名、电话号码、地址等）

物联网行业（设备信息、产品类型等）

金融信息（账户、交易等）

电商行业（商品、物流等）

用户行为（评论、访问等）

社交媒体账号（用户名、昵称等）

智能数据生成

真实的中文姓名组合

格式正确的电话号码和身份证号码

合理的地址信息

多样的商品名称

便捷的操作体验

分类展示，便于快速查找

支持批量填充

支持序号自动递增

新增功能

支持自定义文本填充

可输入多行文本

自动循环填充

支持在容器内批量填充

增强的数据生成器

新增物联网设备类型

优化地址生成算法

纳入更多社交媒体账号类型

版本

当前版本：1.2.0

使用方法

在 Figma 中选择文本图层。

打开插件面板。

选择所需的数据类型。

点击相应按钮填充数据。

更新日志

1.2.0

修复了模块加载问题。

优化了错误处理机制。

1.1.0

新增自定义文本填充功能。

增强了数据生成器。

优化了用户界面。

1.0.0

初始版本发布。

支持多行业数据生成。

优化了用户界面。

新增物联网设备类型数据。




NoMoreWrite

A Figma plugin that assists designers in quickly populating text.

Features

Supports data generation for multiple industries

Common information (names, phone numbers, addresses, etc.)

Internet of Things industry (device information, product types, etc.)

Financial information (accounts, transactions, etc.)

E-commerce industry (products, logistics, etc.)

User behaviors (comments, visits, etc.)

Social media accounts (usernames, nicknames, etc.)

Intelligent data generation

Authentic combinations of Chinese names

Phone numbers and ID numbers in proper formats

Reasonable address information

Diverse product names

Convenient operation experience

Categorized display for quick search

Supports batch filling

Supports automatic increment of sequence numbers

New Features

Supports custom text filling

Allows input of multi-line text

Automatic cyclic filling

Supports batch filling within containers

Enhanced data generator

Adds new types of Internet of Things devices

Optimizes the address generation algorithm

Incorporates more social media account types

Version

Current Version: 1.2.0

Usage Instructions

Select the text layer in Figma.

Open the plugin panel.

Choose the required data type.

Click the corresponding button to populate the data.

Update Log

1.2.0

Fixed the module loading issue.

Optimized the error handling mechanism.

1.1.0

Added the custom text filling function.

Enhanced the data generator.

Optimized the user interface.

1.0.0

Initial version released.

Supported data generation for multiple industries.

Optimized the user interface.

Added data of Internet of Things device types.

accepted.name: walden
accepted.description: A UX designer full of whimsical ideas.

plugins.tagline: 无需选择文本图层，直接填充文案，我不想再一个个手敲了！！！！！

plugins.name: Fast make grid
plugins.description:
🎛️ Grid Generator

Grid Generator es una herramienta que diseñé para crear grillas dinámicas y bien estructuradas basadas en frameworks populares como Bootstrap y Foundation. Mi objetivo fue simplificar la configuración de columnas, breakpoints y márgenes para tus diseños, garantizando precisión y ahorrándote tiempo.


Ya sea que estés trabajando en un diseño responsive, configurando un sistema de diseño o ajustando márgenes precisos, Grid Generator te ofrece la flexibilidad que necesitas para que te concentres en lo importante: ¡diseñar! ✨


✅ Soporte para Frameworks Populares

Genera grillas ajustadas a los breakpoints de:

  1. Bootstrap: Desde xs hasta xxl.
  2. Foundation: Desde small hasta xlarge.


✅ Contenedores Dinámicos

Configura contenedores:

  1. Fixed: Se ajusta al ancho del breakpoint seleccionado.
  2. Fluid: Se adapta al ancho completo del frame.


✅ Márgenes Automáticos

Agrega márgenes externos dinámicos en contenedores Fixed, calculados según el framework seleccionado:

  1. Bootstrap: 12px por lado.
  2. Foundation: 16px por lado.


✅ Cálculo Preciso de Columnas

El plugin ajusta el tamaño de las columnas automáticamente según el ancho disponible, restando márgenes y gutters para garantizar una alineación perfecta.


¿Cómo usarlo?

  1. Selecciona un Frame
  2. Asegúrate de tener un frame seleccionado para aplicar la grilla.
  3. Configura la Grilla
  4. Escoge un framework (Bootstrap o Foundation).
  5. Selecciona un breakpoint.
  6. Define el tipo de contenedor (Fixed o Fluid).
  7. Elige el número de columnas (4 o 12).
  8. Haz clic en "Generar Grilla" para aplicar la configuración al frame.


Opcional: Agregar Márgenes

Si el contenedor es Fixed, usa el botón "Agregar Márgenes" para incluir márgenes externos a los extremos.


Si tienes consejos o mejoras me dejas un comentario!!!
plugins.tagline: Crea grillas rapidamente en un frame para tus diseños responsivos

plugins.name: Delta-E Calculator
plugins.description: Computes color difference as developed by the International Commission on Illumination (CIE) in 2000. The implementation is based on the formula from Bruce Lindbloom. Resulting values range from 0 (no difference) to 100 (maximum difference), and are a metric for how the human eye percieves color difference.
plugins.tagline: Computes metric for how the human eye percieves color difference

76689.name: Delta-E Calculator
76689.description: Computes color difference as developed by the International Commission on Illumination (CIE) in 2000. The implementation is based on the formula from Bruce Lindbloom. Resulting values range from 0 (no difference) to 100 (maximum difference), and are a metric for how the human eye percieves color difference.
76689.tagline: Computes metric for how the human eye percieves color difference

plugins.name: Automator: Automate hundreds of creatives instantly.
plugins.description:
Want to create hundreds of creatives instantly? Well now you can!


Introducing Automator, a plugin built to make executing multiple creatives quick and easy.


How does it work?

Automator takes your existing creatives within Figma and applies data to that creative from a spreadsheet. You can simply drag your spreadsheet of data into Automator and it will convert that data into creatives. The only thing you need to do is make sure that your item names match the headers in your spreadsheet. The data can consist of text and images (note that images need to be served from a URL).


For best results make sure that you have you prepared your 'template' creatives in a way that work best for your data. Make sure that your text boxes are sized in a way that the new text can fit, such as keeping the box boundaries within the creative space. Automator automatically resizes the text to fit the text box, so keep that in mind when it comes to text that you don't want to be larger than a button or text that goes over an focal point of an image.
plugins.tagline: Automate hundreds of creatives instantly.

112978.name: Automator: Automate hundreds of creatives instantly.
112978.description:

Automator automatically resizes the text to fit the text box, so keep that in mind when it comes to text that you don't want to be larger than a button or text that goes over an focal point of an image.

plugins.name: MarkCraft
plugins.description:
As tools like ChatGPT, Claude, and other AI chats become an everyday part of our creative workflow, we’re constantly generating content in Markdown — ideas, research, notes, and UI copy. But bringing that content into Figma usually means losing all formatting. MarkCraft bridges that gap, turning raw Markdown into beautifully styled, editable text — so your insights look as good as your designs.


Headings, bold, italics, and lists are automatically applied using Figma’s native text features — no manual styling needed. Craft better content inside Figma — with just one click.


⚡ Key Features

Easy Edit

Convert Markdown into fully formatted Figma text — and keep editing like any native text layer.


Smart Lists

Supports clean bulleted and numbered lists (single-level only for V1).


Text Styling

Automatically applies headings, bold, italic — directly into Figma’s text nodes.


Auto Layout Friendly

Generates tidy, responsive frames ready for layout and resizing.
plugins.tagline: Markdown to Figma Made Effortless

plugins.name: Convert to ICO
plugins.description:
Convert to Ico is a simple yet powerful Figma plugin that helps designers and developers easily transform any Figma element into Windows ICO icon files.


Key Features:

• Convert any Frame, Group, or Image to ICO format

• Multiple preset size options (16px, 32px, 48px, 64px, 128px)

• Real-time preview functionality

• Clean and intuitive interface

• Quick one-click export


Whether you're designing Windows application icons, website favicons, or working on any project that requires ICO format, Convert to Ico streamlines your workflow with its efficient conversion process.
plugins.tagline: Convert any Figma design to ICO icons in one click

125328.name: Convert to ICO
125328.description:
Convert to Ico is a simple yet powerful Figma plugin that helps designers and developers easily transform any Figma element into Windows ICO icon files.


Key Features:

• Convert any Frame, Group, or Image to ICO format

• Multiple preset size options (16px, 32px, 48px, 64px, 128px)

• Real-time preview functionality

• Clean and intuitive interface

• Quick one-click export


Whether you're designing Windows application icons, website favicons, or working on any project that requires ICO format, Convert to Ico streamlines your workflow with its efficient conversion process.
125328.tagline: Convert any Figma design to ICO icons in one click

plugins.name: ComfyUI-Image-Generator-Advance
plugins.description:
ComfyUI Image Generator Advance

Seamlessly Integrate Any ComfyUI Workflow

Powered by Comfy Deploy, this plugin bridges Figma with limitless AI workflows. Unleash unparalleled freedom to connect Figma and AI—customize, innovate, and create without boundaries!


---


Features

Unlock ComfyUI’s Full Potential:

Every feature ComfyUI offers is at your fingertips. If you can build it in ComfyUI, you can integrate it with Figma for AI-powered image generation!

Endless Customization:

Turn complex workflows into streamlined Figma actions.


---


Quick Start Guide

  1. Registeron: deploy.comfyui.asia
  2. Install the comfyui-deploy plugin in ComfyUI and configure your workflow . see tutorial.
  3. Deploy your workflow on deploy.comfyui.asia , configure GPU settings (you can use your own GPU), and obtain your API key.
  4. Launch the ComfyUI Image Generator Advance plugin in Figma, enter your API key, and start generating—your custom workflow parameters will auto-load!


FAQ


Q: Is this plugin free?

A: We offer affordable paid plans to cover server costs and future upgrades. Your support keeps the innovation alive! 💡


Q: Why are generated images downscaled?

A: To ensure smooth data transfer and avoid bottlenecks, images are temporarily resized to a max of 1536 px on the longest edge. For full resolution, use upscaling workflows after initial processing.


Q: Why do requests sometimes fail?

A: ComfyUI’s API is still evolving. Check your browser console for errors, refresh the plugin, or retry the task. Ensure stable internet—**VPN required for users in mainland China**.


Q: Are servers located in China?

A: No. Due to AI regulations and licensing complexities, servers are hosted overseas. Users in China may experience slight latency; a stable VPN connection is recommended.


---


Full Documentation** → Get Started

Explore More→ Visit Our Official Site


---


Why Choose Us?

  1. Flexible Workflows: Your creativity, your rules.
  2. Global Scalability: Cloud-powered performance, wherever you are.
  3. Pro-Level Control: Perfect for designers and developers alike.
plugins.tagline: Seamlessly Integrate Any ComfyUI Workflow

plugins.name: ComfyUI-Image-Generator-Cloud
plugins.description:
ComfyUI Image Generator Cloud


> Transform your Figma designs with AI-powered image generation, right where you need it!


🌟 Key Features


1. Powerful AI Models

- Powered by FLUX.1 series (Schnell/Dev/Pro)

- Enterprise-grade image quality

- Lightning-fast generation speed (4-28 steps)


2. Smart Workflows

- Text to Image: Create from descriptions

- Style Transfer: Apply any style to your images

- Background Removal: One-click clean backgrounds

- Image Upscaling: Enhance quality up to 4x

- Batch Processing: Handle multiple images efficiently


3. Designer-Friendly Features

- AI Prompt Enhancement: Get better results automatically

- Custom Aspect Ratios: Perfect fit for any design

- Style Strength Control: Fine-tune style transfer

- Direct Import: Seamlessly place in your designs

- Format Options: PNG/JPG with quality control


🚀 Getting Started


1. Purchase license

2. Get Replicate API key

3. Activate plugin with license

4. Start creating!


## 📖 Documentation

Detailed tutorials: [Full Documentation]

My website：https://figma.comfyui.asia/


❓ FAQ


Q: Why is this a paid plugin?

A: We've invested significant resources in testing and optimizing workflows to deliver professional-grade results. Your support helps us maintain and improve the plugin continuously.


Q: Is this a one-time purchase?

A: No, we use a subscription model to provide continuous updates and improvements.


Q: Why do I need a separate Replicate API key?

A: This model gives you complete control over your API usage and costs, with no hidden fees or arbitrary limits.


💡 Coming Soon

- More AI models and workflows

- Advanced batch processing

- Custom style presets

- Workflow automation

plugins.name: E3 Variant Finder
plugins.description:
A very simple plugin we developed for collaboration in our team. It allows programmers to find the required instance by provided component name and instance name.


Application area: it allows to simplify communication between programmer and designer, if you need to change not all instances of a component, but only one of them.


  1. The designer sends the programmer the full path to the variant in format: [Page] | [Component Name] | [Variant Name].
  2. The programmer inserts the received data into the plugin field and presses the Find button.
  3. The plugin selects and focuses on the desired variant.
plugins.tagline: Easily find the right variant

63321.name: E3 Variant Finder
63321.description:
A very simple plugin we developed for collaboration in our team. It allows programmers to find the required instance by provided component name and instance name.


Application area: it allows to simplify communication between programmer and designer, if you need to change not all instances of a component, but only one of them.


  1. The designer sends the programmer the full path to the variant in format: [Page] | [Component Name] | [Variant Name].
  2. The programmer inserts the received data into the plugin field and presses the Find button.
  3. The plugin selects and focuses on the desired variant.

plugins.name: Button States Generator
plugins.description:
Enhance your design workflow with the Button States Generator and create consistent, accessible button components effortlessly.


Overview


The Button States Generator is a Figma plugin designed to streamline the creation of button components with multiple states: Default, Hover, Active, Focus, Selected, and Disabled.


Features


- Dynamic Button Creation: Generate button components with customizable dimensions, radius, paddings & colors

- State Variants: Automatically create and manage button states including Default, Hover, Active, Focus, Selected, and Disabled.

- Color Customization: Easily adjust each state colors, with options to randomize or reset to default.

- Contrast Checker: Built-in contrast checker ensures your design meets WCAG standards for accessibility.

- Icon Placement Options: Choose from multiple icon placement options (none, left, right, or icon-only) as a component property.


How to Use


Assuming you already have your button design ready:


1. Select button Frame: Start by selecting the frame of your button.

2. Customize Settings (optional): Use the plugin's UI to adjust dimensions, colors, and other settings if necessary.

3. Choose Icon Placement (optional): Select the icon placement option from the dropdown menu (none, left, right, or icon-only).

4. Generate Components: Click 'Create Component' to generate the button variants.


Note: This will not work if you select a pre-existing component. If your button is a component, detach it to convert it into a Frame.


Component Properties


The generated button component includes these useful properties:


- States: Choose between Default, Hover, Focus, Selected, and Disabled states

- Icon: Control icon placement (None, Left, Right, Only)

- Colors: Adjust text and background colors for each state

- Dimensions: Fine-tune sizing, radius and padding


Support


For any questions or support, please contact luc.hespel@gmail.com
plugins.tagline: Generate Button component with variants / states instantly

plugins.name: in any case
plugins.description:
From effortless case changes to instant text metrics, this plugin integrates perfectly with both Figma and FigJam, adapting to your workflow and style. Simplify your design process and keep your text consistent, no matter the case!


Apply the most popular case transformations with ease, including Title Case, Sentence case, UPPERCASE, lowercase, tOOGLE cASE, camelCase, kebab-case, snake_case, PascalCase, and flatcase. Easily convert the case of text across multiple layers, components, and instances at once, with maintaining your font styles and formatting while making those changes.


  1. Access case conversion and text stats instantly through the actions menu, speeding up your workflow. Simply use Cmd + / on Mac or Ctrl + / on Win
  2. View character, word, sentence, and paragraphs counts, which dynamically update as you type or select text
  3. See the results of your case changes immediately
  4. Enjoy full functionality in both Figma and FigJam
  5. Continue working in your preferrable Dark or Light modes with native Figma colors
  6. Rest assured that your data is safe – this plugin doesn’t store or send any of your text or design data
plugins.tagline: Instant case conversion and text metrics

108858.description:

plugins.name: Rumin - AI Design Copilot
plugins.description:
Meet Your Personal Design Assistant

Step into the future of design with the world's smartest AI powered design assistant. Built to make you extraordinarily productive, Rumin is the best way to design with AI.


❇️ Validate Design Decisions

Get one-click instant, expert feedback on everything from visual hierarchy to usability flows, eliminating blind spots in your design decisions.


❇️ Just Select a Frame -> Ask Anything

No need to describe or upload screenshots of your design — Rumin sees exactly what you see and gives instant, contextual feedback.


❇️ Personal Design Assistant

No question is too big or too small—unlock unlimited expert guidance on every facet of design, from typography and color theory to fundamental design principles and beyond.


❇️ Built within Figma

Your design assistant lives where you work—no more context switching, no extra windows, it's like having ChatGPT right inside Figma.


❇️ Contextual Content Writing

Generate tailored UX writing, headlines, and descriptions that match your design's tone and purpose.


❇️ Developer-Ready Code at Your Fingertips

Bridge the developer handoff gap with accurate code snippets generated directly from your designs.


**Note: Alpha Release — Invite-Only Access

Website: www.rumin.cloud
plugins.tagline: AI Copilot for Figma — Analyze Designs, Chat with AI, Search the Web. All inside Figma.

❇️ Developer-Ready Code at Your Fingertips

Bridge the developer handoff gap with accurate code snippets generated directly from your designs.


**Note: Alpha Release — Invite-Only Access

Website: www.rumin.cloud
133152.release_notes:
- AI response improvements
- In-built feedback system added
- Text layer support added
- Improved frame selection 
- Chat box auto-focus added
- Improved message formatting
- Support for transparent frames added
133152.tagline: AI Copilot for Figma — Analyze Designs, Chat with AI, Search the Web. All inside Figma.

plugins.name: Align Screenshots
plugins.description:
選択したスクリーンショットを横一列に並べます。


使い方

1. スクリーンショットを複数選択します。

2. 1枚あたりのWidthと、スクリーンショット同士の余白を指定します。

3. 本プラグインを実行します。


------


This plugin arranges selected screenshots side by side in a horizontal row.


How to Use

1. Select multiple screenshots.

2. Specify the width for each screenshot and the margin between them.

3. Run the plugin.
plugins.tagline: The plugin lines up images with fixed width and spacing.

plugins.name: Blobs Generator - Create Dynamic and Customizable Blobs
plugins.description:
🎨 Blobs Generator Plugin: Effortlessly create unique and dynamic shapes for your designs!


How to use:


  1. Select a Style: Choose from styles like Organic, Smooth, Spiky, and more.
  2. Adjust Colors: Opt for solid or gradient fill and pick your favorite colors.
  3. Customize the Shape: Use sliders to tweak complexity and uniqueness.
  4. Real-Time Preview: Instantly see changes in the preview.
  5. Create and Save: Click 'Create Blob' to generate and save your creation in history.
  6. Explore and Restore: Browse history to revisit and restore previous blobs.



✨ Tip: Use the 'Randomize' button for surprising and inspiring shapes!


With Blob Generator, bring your creations to life quickly and enjoyably! 🚀"
plugins.tagline: Effortlessly generate and customize unique blob shapes for your design projects.

plugins.name: Simple Connector
plugins.description:
Its FREE!

Using this connector tool, Designers can now connect two or more Horizontally or Vertically placed art-boards or frames using a default line customisable with preselect colours or as per users liking.


Note: Its essential to have the art boards aligned Horizontally or Vertically first before one could use the plugin.

plugins.name: SectionNums
plugins.description:
Adds page numbers to all sections


Add page numbers to only sections and update them easily!

Automatically add and update page numbers in sections based on Frame position from top left to bottom right


SectionNums works by selecting a component and replacing the text in instances of that component with page numbers.


Basic usage:

  • Add and update page numbers in sections based on Section position from top left to bottom right
  • Add page numbers to sections without them
  • Change the position of page numbers in bulk
plugins.tagline: SectionNums add and update  page numbers for each section from top left to bottom right on Figma,

plugins.name: Master Gen
plugins.description:
Description


Automate the creation of components and accelerate your workflow by eliminating repetitive tasks. The Master gen plugin helps you save precious time by easily transforming any number of objects into master components and their instances. This allows you to minimize routine operations and focus on bringing your creative ideas to life.



How to use it?


1. Select objects of the same type

2. Run the plugin master gen



Contact


Telegram channel - https://t.me/DesignClown

Feedback - https://t.me/Zombikot

plugins.name: The Rolling Machine
plugins.description:
A simple, minimal plugin to create a consistent page structure for your files with a single click. No UI, no complexity, no fuss!


Simply start a new file and run the plugin — The Rolling Machine will automatically create pages intended to support the design process and ensure positive developer handoff:


  • 🏁 Cover
  • 🔮 Hypothesis
  • ✅ Handoff
  • 👀 Prototype
  • 🧪 Testing

——————————————

  • 💻 Research
  • ⚙️ Explorations
  • 🔀 Flows
  • 🙋 Crit / Review
  • 📜 Archive


Originally built as an internal plugin for the design team at Leafly, based on the great work of the folks at Project Scaffold — go check them out!
plugins.tagline: A simple, automated file builder.

plugins.name: Golden Ratio
plugins.description:
One-Click Generation, Precision Design

Automatically generates centerlines, vertical lines, and golden ratio lines for quick alignment and precise positioning. Marks layer center points to ensure symmetrical and balanced layouts.


Anchor Point Visualization, Efficient Editing

Clearly displays layer anchor points, enabling fast path adjustments and boosting vector editing efficiency.


Simple to Use, Professional and Efficient

No complex steps—generate guides with one click, saving time on manual calculations. Perfect for graphic design, UI design, and illustration.


Core Features

Centerlines & Vertical Lines

Golden Ratio Lines

Layer Anchor Point Display
plugins.tagline: Smart tool generates centerlines, golden ratio lines, and anchor points for precise.

plugins.name: Text Localizer
plugins.description:
🚀 Simplify your localization workflow with our powerful Figma plugin!


The Localization Plugin scans all text layers within a selected frame and automatically binds them to Figma variables, making it effortless to manage translations and text updates. Whether you're working on multilingual designs or simply organizing your text layers more efficiently, this tool streamlines the process.


✨ Features:

✅ Scan Selected Frames – Instantly detect all text layers within a frame.

✅ Bind Text to Variables – Assign Figma variables to text layers for seamless localization.

✅ Export & Manage Text Layers – Save and load text layer collections with ease.

✅ CSV Export Support – Quickly export text data for external use.


🔍 How It Works:

1️⃣ Select a frame in Figma.

2️⃣ Open the Localization Plugin.

3️⃣ Scan the selected frame for text layers.

4️⃣ Bind text layers to variables or export them as CSV.

5️⃣ Apply changes instantly and manage text efficiently!


🌟 New Features (Version 1.2.0)

Smart Layer Selection: The plugin now automatically detects and unselects text layers that are already bound to variables, preventing accidental duplication and redundant work.

Visual Binding Indicators: Text layers that are already bound to variables are now clearly marked with a purple variable icon in a light green background, making it easier to identify localized content.

Improved UI Elements: Count badges in the "Generate Variables" button now have a more polished, pill-shaped design that follows Figma's design patterns.


✨ Improvements (Version 1.2.0)

Automatic UI Update: The interface now automatically refreshes after generating variables to show accurate binding status.

Better Visual Hierarchy: The redesigned interface makes it clearer which layers are available for localization and which are already handled.

Enhanced Tooltips: Added helpful tooltips to explain why certain layers are pre-unselected.


🛠️ Technical Updates (Version 1.2.0)

Async Layer Scanning: Layer scanning now uses async/await for improved performance and reliability.

Optimized Variable Detection: More robust detection of bound variables for accurate status representation.
plugins.tagline: Streamline your Figma design localization process

plugins.name: Custom Color System
plugins.description:
Custom Color System


Transform a single color into a fully branded, accessible design system by generating color scales and organizing them into an intuitive semantic structure for effortless implementation.


  1. Input one brand color, get a complete interface color system
  2. Automatic color harmonies with proper contrast ratios
  3. Light & dark theme support
  4. Organized semantic color variables ready to use
  5. Optional advanced mode for granular control
  6. Built on Radix Colors for reliable accessibility
plugins.tagline: Turn one color into an accessible design system with scales and semantics, powered by Radix.

115966.description:

Transform a single color into a fully branded, accessible design system by generating color scales and organizing them into an intuitive semantic structure for effortless implementation.

  2. Automatic color harmonies with proper contrast ratios
  3. Light & dark theme support
  4. Organized semantic color variables ready to use
  5. Optional advanced mode for granular control
  6. Built on Radix Colors for reliable accessibility
115966.release_notes: Multi-Mode Detection: When applicable, automatically disable Light & Dark mode option due to Figma's limitation of one mode for free users.
115966.tagline: Turn one color into an accessible design system with scales and semantics, powered by Radix.
